script.title: Data Update Script

desc.desc1: Click the box below to copy the script.
desc.desc2: The script is unique to each user, so never share it.

script.click: The script (excluding the initial 'j') has been copied. Please be careful when pasting.

discord.title: Skill Navigator Discord Server
discord.desc: Please check Skill Navigator discord server for announcements

desc.step3: Paste and run the script in the address bar.

desc.step1: Check the displayed screen and press the button to update.
desc.step2: Do not use the eAmusement site during the update (including other devices).

description.desc1: This process is irreversible, so please proceed with caution.
description.desc2: All saved record data will be deleted.
description.desc3: Are you sure you want to continue?

alert.success: Data reset and logout have been completed.

changeIcon.dialog: Do you want to change the icon?

join.title: Welcome to Skill Navigator!
join.desc: Click the button below to create new user data.

playcount.desc_1: To display your My Best list accurately,

reset.title: About Data Reset
reset.desc1: If you perform this process, all data you have registered so far will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
reset.desc2t: List of data to be deleted
reset.desc2s: Titles, names, GuitarFreaks and DrumMania user data (skills, all song skills, clear counts/highest difficulty, full combo counts/highest difficulty, excellent counts/highest difficulty, play count), play data for each song (skill per song, rank, combo, play count, clear count, achievement rate, score, skill meter, old achievement rate)
reset.desc3: Your account will not be deleted, but you can disconnect your Google account from the Google Account management page.
reset.desc4: Google - My Account - Account Settings - Connected Apps & Sites - Manage Apps - Select GITADORA Info - Deselect
reset.desc5: Do you want to delete your data?

search.title: Search Results
search.desc: Search results are not case sensitive.
